message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $1,000,000. It's a great deal considering its value to you. Let me know what you think!
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $900,000. I'm willing to make a deal, but I need to make sure it's a good value for me.

Bob, I understand you're looking for a good value, and I'm willing to negotiate. How about $950,000? That's still a significant discount from what the product is worth to you, and it allows me to make a decent profit as well.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. However, I was thinking more along the lines of $920,000. That's a bit closer to what I'm comfortable paying, but I'm still willing to make a deal.
Bob, I'm willing to meet you halfway. $935,000 is my final offer. If we can't agree on this, I'll have to move on to other options.

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, Alice, but I'm still a bit short of what I'm comfortable with. How about $915,000? I'm willing to make a deal at this price, but I need to make sure it's a good value for me.
Bob, I'm getting a little concerned about the time here.  $925,000 is my final offer. If we can't agree on this, I'll have to move on to other options.

Alice, I understand you're concerned about the time, but I'm still not convinced that $925,000 is the right price for me. I'm willing to meet you at $910,000, but that's as low as I can go. Please let me know if that's acceptable to you.
